Created page with "{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_DragonPain'''
(''no parameter'')
Calls [[A_Pain]] and then checks to see if the tracer target is set. If not, then it jumps to the Spawn..."
revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen}} '''A_DragonPain'''
(''no parameter'')
Calls [[A_Pain]] and then checks to see if the tracer target is set. If not, then it jumps to the Spawn state. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Dragon}} and derived classes.
